title: [Large-Scale] Program Integrity-Based Social Problem-Solving Project Development Process

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational programming and social issue analysis experience
context.additional_context: Current elementary school teachers develop programs to solve community issues using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can develop a program design plan incorporating ethical responsibility and public accountability during the planning phase
Learners can create functional specifications for solving social issues based on user research data
Learners can document the entire process from prototype development to evaluation using team-based PBL methodologies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
